comprehensive_overview: VarDict-java is a variant discovery and genotyping tool that can analyze variants from DNA/RNA sequencing. It identifies, filters, annotates somatic and germline variants, and can be used for both targeted and whole-genome sequencing data.
core_features:
1. Variant discovery and genotyping
2. Analysis of somatic and germline variants
3. Annotation of variants
4. Suitable for targeted and whole-genome sequencing data
